attributes.action: Condemn the BBC for spending our licence fee on 'The Verdict', a programme that trivialises rape.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'The Verdict' is an ill-conceived 'reality' TV show, which attempts to make entertainment out of the most horrendous of crimes. It is insensitive to survivors of rape and its use of 'celebrity' jurors, one of whom is notorious for violence against women, is tacky sensationalism of the worst kind.  The Government should be spending this money on trying to keep struggling Rape Crisis centres open, not pouring Champagne down Lord Archer's throat.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
